summary: This is an email chain from August 2019 discussing media reporting about overtime shifts worked by officers, with a request to confirm records. It appears to be internal administrative communication, possibly related to staffing or public relations concerns following media attention.

events.title: Media reporting on officer overtime
events.description: Media reported on one officer being mandated and another working five straight days of overtime.

keyFacts: The email is dated August 12, 2019, with a prior message from August 11, 2019.
The subject is 'NY OT shifts', indicating a discussion about overtime shifts in New York.
Media reporting is mentioned concerning one officer being mandated and another working five consecutive days of overtime.
A request is made to confirm the exact records of these overtime shifts first thing in the morning.
The correspondence appears to be internal, sent from mobile devices, and marked as of normal importance.
